Topic: Draw two habitats and the different living things in each
Evidence Statements: The student can draw and label at least two different habitats, such as a land habitat and a water habitat.
The student can draw and label different types of plants and animals that are found in each habitat.
The student can make comparisons by showing different types of living things in each habitat through their drawings.
The student can observe and draw patterns showing plant and animal diversity across the habitats they illustrate.
The student can organize and clearly label their drawings to show the observations made about each habitat.
